title: TS802 Vehicular Troposcatter Communication/SATCOM Station
explain: TS802 is a BLOS communication vehicular station integrating troposcatter communication and SATCOM. Adopting off-road jeep chassis, it is mainly used to provide the maneuvering combat units with remote access communication to their superior command center or national defense optical-fiber network. TS802 provides integrated services to the user such as voice, IP data, image and fax
form:
Troposcatter Communication Mode

Specifications
Communication rate256kbps-8Mbps
Communication distance (Ns=310, smooth spherical surface)200km@256kbps;130km@2Mbps;100km@8Mbp
Operation frequency14.5GHz-15.35GHz
Antenna3-element antenna
Transmitting power80W×3
Power consumption (not including air condition)≤2.5kW

SATCOM Mode

Specifications
Communication rate256kbps-2Mbps
Operation frequencyUplink: 14GHz-14.5GHz;Downlink:12.25GHz-12.75GHz;
Transmitting power40W
Power consumption (not including air condition)≤0.5kW
